paragraphs.english: On November 26, 2025, a terrible fire broke out in Wang Fuk Yuen, Tai Po, Hong Kong, which shocked the whole city. The fire started from the scaffolding on the outer wall of a building in Wang Fuk Yuen at about 2:51 pm. Within just a few hours, it escalated to a Level 5 fire, the second-highest alarm level in Hong Kong.

sevenFive.text: A Severe Fire in Hong Kong: On November 26, 2025, a terrible fire in Wang Fuk Yuen, Tai Po, Hong Kong. The fire started from the scaffolding on the outer wall of a building at about 2:51 pm. , it escalated to a Level 5 fire, which is the second-highest alarm level in Hong Kong. Strong winds played a big role in the fast spread of the fire, as they made the flames to seven nearby buildings. The old scaffolding and green construction nets on the buildings made the fire burn more fiercely. The high temperature at the scene was for firefighters. Some residents were trapped on the upper floors, and rescuers could not reach them at once because of the extreme heat. However, the rescue team did not give up. They with the trapped people by phone to calm them down and told them to stay away from the fire. More than 700 firefighters and rescue workers were sent to the scene, along with many fire engines and ambulances. , the fire caused 13 deaths and 28 injuries, including a 37-year-old firefighter who lost his life while fighting the blaze. The Hong Kong government took quick action to help the affected people. It opened temporary shelters and sent social workers to offer help. Schools near the fire site were closed the next day . The cause of the fire is still under investigation, and it reminds everyone of the importance of fire safety.
